alert.note: Alert for City of Hyder (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 9:06PM AKST until February 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW EXPECTED FOR THE MISTY FJORDS AREA... .Another front and surge of moisture moving in off the northeastern Pacific will bring more snow tonight through Thursday night across the Misty Fjords and Hyder areas where colder temperatures persist. Snowfall could be heavy at times. Elsewhere across the southern Alaska Panhandle, mostly rain is expected through Thursday except for higher elevations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 12 inches. * WHERE...City of Hyder. * WHEN...From now until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways as well as lower visibility over the water and by air. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will become heavier and more difficult to manage Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
